page.title: 17MY HOME
page.content: I am woken up in the morning by an alarm clock,sometimes I go and make a cup of tea.I have breakfast normally sausages,fried bread,mushrooms,and bacon and egg.Next I go into my cupboard and find some cloth.I cut out some shapes and sew and stuff them . At ten o clock I go shopping with my mum. When I get back I ask for something to eat.My Mum says "In a moment.You're always hungry".My baby brother starts crying and I take him in.It's just after 12." It's gone dinner time, "I said" he's crying again".Mum says He's hungry." in a tired voice.We have African soup-"Ugh! It's got too much chillie pepper !" After dinner we play out and looked for lizards on the old railway bank.After tea we play games until bed time at nine o clock . Roselyn Udoh aged 10.
